tool.name: HighResPrecursorMassCorrector
tool.description: Corrects the precursor mass and charge determined by the instrument software.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out && #if $out_csv_FLAG: mkdir out_csv && #end if #if $feature.in: mkdir feature.in && ln -s '$feature.in' 'feature.in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $feature.in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($feature.in.ext)' && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && export PYTHONPATH='$__tool_directory__/CTDopts/' && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' #if $out_csv_FLAG: -out_csv 'out_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if $feature.in: -feature:in 'feature.in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $feature.in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($feature.in.ext)' #end if
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mzml")}' '$out' #if $out_csv_FLAG: && mv 'out_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_csv' #end if #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: out_csv_FLAG
param.label: Generate output out_csv (Optional CSV output file for results on 'nearest_peak' or 'highest_intensity_peak' algorithm (see corresponding subsection) containing columns: RT, uncorrectedMZ, correctedMZ, deltaMZ)

section.name: feature
section.title: Use features for precursor mass correction

param.name: in
param.label: Features used to correct precursor masses

param.name: mz_tolerance
param.label: The precursor mass tolerance
param.help: Used to determine matching to feature mass traces

param.name: rt_tolerance
param.label: Additional retention time tolerance added to feature boundaries

param.name: max_trace
param.label: Maximum isotopic trace considered in matching a precursor to a feature

param.name: believe_charge
param.label: Assume precursor charge to be correct

param.name: keep_original
param.label: Make a copy of the precursor and MS2 (true) or discard the original (false)

param.name: assign_all_matching
param.label: Correct a precursor using all matching features (true) or only the nearest (false)
param.help: Only evaluated if copies are created (feature:keep_original)

section.name: nearest_peak
section.title: Use nearest centroided MS1 peak for precursor mass correction

param.name: mz_tolerance
param.label: The precursor mass tolerance to find the closest MS1 peak

section.name: highest_intensity_peak
section.title: Use centroided MS1 peak with the highest intensity in a certrain mass range - for precursor mass correction

param.name: mz_tolerance
param.label: The precursor mass tolerance to find the highest intensity MS1 peak
param.help: Suggested value 1/max. expected charge. (Disable method by setting value to 0.0)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Corrects the precursor mass and charge determined by the instrument software.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/TOPP_HighResPrecursorMassCorrector.html
